name: Thank You For Your Service - VR Game
name_original: Thank You For Your Service - VR Game
description:
A VR HEADSET IS REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME! FOR BEST EXPERIENCE USE OCULUS!

Set in a dystopian future where one company, Arch has grown to be the largest company in the solar system. Like everyone else, the Player is forced to work in one of the many sorting centres on the planet Mars. However, the company holds a dark secret which the player can either expose or continue to hide.

The player takes control of employee #54267, who every day has to sort out the packages and meeting the daily quota. However, the player will have the choice to help bring down the Arch and it’s leader by doing things for the terrorist group ‘Union’.

Made as part of my Final Year Project. 

Credits:

Designed, Programmed and modelled by Adam Tedder

Voice acting by Luke Tedder

Environmental Assets from Epic Games Marketplace and Quixel
